description:
The Imperium of Man is a galaxy-spanning interstellar Human empire, the ultimate authority for the majority of the Human species in the Milky Way Galaxy in the 41st Millennium A.D. It is ruled by the living god who is known as the Emperor of Mankind.

The founder and ruler of the Imperium is the god-like Emperor of Mankind, the most powerful Human psyker ever born. The Emperor founded the Imperium over 10,000 Terran years ago in the late 30th Millennium during the Unification Wars on Old Earth following the terrible period in Human history known as the Age of Strife.

killteams.description:
The Adepta Sororitas, colloquially called the "Sisterhood," whose military arm is also known as the Sisters of Battle and formerly as the Daughters of the Emperor, are an all-female division of the Imperium of Man's state church known as the Ecclesiarchy or, more formally, as the Adeptus Ministorum.

The Sisterhood's Orders Militant serve as the Ecclesiarchy's armed forces, mercilessly rooting out spiritual corruption and heresy within Humanity and every organisation of the Adeptus Terra.

strat.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS operative, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical saves, you can re-roll one of your failed saves.

Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.
Until the end of the Turning Point: <ul><li>Each time a friendly ARCO-FLAGELLANT operative performs a Dash or Charge action, it can move an additional [TRI] for that action.

tac.description: Use this Tactical Ploy in the Resolve Successful Hits step of a combat or shooting attack, when an attack die would inflict damage on a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS operative. Ignore the damage inflicted from that attack die.

Use this Tactical Poly when a friendly SISTER REPENTIA or ARCO-FLAGELLANT operative is incapacitated in combat by an enemy operative. Before that friendly operative is removed from the killzone, select one melee weapon it is equipped with and roll one attack die as if it is fighting in combat. If the result is a successful hit, you can immediately strike an enemy operative within Engagement Range of it. Then remove that friendly operative from the killzone as normal.

Use this Tactical Poly when a friendly BATTLE SISTER GUNNER or BATTLE SISTER HEAVY GUNNER operative is activated. Until the end of that operative's activation, ranged weapons it is equipped with lose the Heavy special rule and gain the No Cover special rule.

killteams.killteamcomp:
An ECCLESIARCHY kill team consists of two fireteams selected from the following list:
  • BATTLE SISTER
  • REPENTIA
  • ARCO-FLAGELLANT (max one per kill team)

operatives.description: The Ecclesiarchy punishes those guilty of heresy in a number of ways. Those subjected to arco-flagellation are painfully remade - fitted with cybernetic weapons and sensory suppressors - then driven into a frenzy and unleashed as near-mindless killing machines.
operatives.keywords: ECCLESIARCHY, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, ADEPTA SORORITAS, ARCO-FLAGELLANT

abilities.title: Berserk Killing Machine
abilities.description: Each time this operative would lose a wound, roll 1D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost. This operative cannot perform mission actions or Pick Up actions. Unless otherwise specified, this operative cannot be equipped with equipment.

fireteams.fireteamcomp: An ARCO-FLAGELLANT fire team includes five ARCO-FLAGELLANT operatives.

operatives.description: The Sisters Superior form the crux of each squad of Battle Sisters. They speak with an authority derived from years of combat and supreme faith in the God-Emperor.
operatives.keywords: ECCLESIARCHY, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, ADEPTA SORORITAS, <ORDER>, BATTLE SISTER, LEADER

operatives.description: These Sisters are thrice blessed to bear the holy icons known as Simulacrum Imperialis. Each artefact is an object of fervent devotion - representations of martyred warriors, recreations of objects and deeds associated with them or repositories of their mortal remains.
operatives.keywords: ECCLESIARCHY, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, ADEPTA SORORITAS, <ORDER>, BATTLE SISTER, ICON BEARER

uniqueactions.title: Icon Of Purity
uniqueactions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, while this operative is Visible to and within [SQUARE] of a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS operative, that friendly operative is inspired by purity. While an operative is inspired by purity, each time it fights in combat or makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can retain one of your attack dice results of 5+ that is a successful hit as a critical hit.

abilities.title: Icon Bearer
abilities.description: When determining control of an objective marker, treat this operative's APL as being 1 higher. Note that this is not a modifier. In narrative play, this is cumulative with the Focused Battloe Honour (see Core Rule Book).

operatives.description: Some Sisters are blessed to receive training in the use of special-issue, close-assault weapons. These sisters ritually maintain their Storm Bolters, Flamers, and Meltaguns, which they use in battle to unleash a blistering repudiation of heresy.
operatives.keywords: ECCLESIARCHY, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, ADEPTA SORORITAS, <ORDER>, BATTLE SISTER, GUNNER

operatives.description: Among the highly trained Adepta Sororitas, those Sisters granted the honour to bear the most potent armaments enable their team to engage heavily armoured opposition. Their expert eye for target prioritisation and enemy weak points makes them powerful assets.
operatives.keywords: ECCLESIARCHY, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, ADEPTA SORORITAS, <ORDER>, BATTLE SISTER, GUNNER

operatives.description: Battle Sisters are the foot soldiers of the God-Emperor. Before their thundering boltguns, countless aliens, traitors, heretics, and mutants have met their doom. With voices raised high in prayer, their faith forms a shield around their souls.
operatives.keywords: ECCLESIARCHY, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, ADEPTA SORORITAS, <ORDER>, BATTLE SISTER, WARRIOR

fireteams.fireteamcomp:
A BATTLE SISTER fire team includes five BATTLE SISTER operatives selected from the following list:
  • BATTLE SISTER WARRIOR
  • BATTLE SISTER ICON BEARER
  • BATTLE SISTER GUNNER each separately equipped with Gun Butt and one of the following options:
    • Meltagun, Ministorum Flamer, or Storm Bolter
  • BATTLE SISTER HEAVY GUNNER each separately equipped with Gun Butt and one of the following options:
    • Heavy Bolter or Ministorum Heavy Flamer
Each BATTLE SISTER fire team can only include up to one BATTLE SISTER GUNNER operative.
Your kill team can only include up to one BATTLE SISTER HEAVY GUNNER operative, and it can only do so if your kill team includes two BATTLE SISTER fire teams.
Your kill team can only include up to one BATTLE SISTER ICON BEARER.
If your kill team does not include any other LEADER operatives, instead of selecting one BATTLE SISTER WARRIOR operative for one BATTLE SISTER fire team, you can select one BATTLE SISTER SUPERIOR operative equipped with one option from each of the following:
  • Chainsword, Gun Butt, Power Maul, or Power Weapon
  • Bolt Pistol, Boltgun, Combi-Melta, Combi-Plasma, Condemnor Boltgun, Inferno Pistol, Ministorum Combi-Flamer, Ministorum Hand Flamer, or Plasma Pistol

operatives.description: The solemn task of guiding wayward Sisters in their atonement falls to Repentia Superior. These veterans are stern taskmasters who drive their charges forward with bellowed prayers and lashes from their neural whips, watching vigilantly for any remnant signs of sinfulness.
operatives.keywords: ECCLESIARCHY, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, ADEPTA SORORITAS, <ORDER>, REPENTIA, SUPERIOR, LEADER

uniqueactions.title: Whip Into Fury
uniqueactions.description: Select one friendly SISTER REPENTIA operative within [SQUARE] of and Visible to this operative. Add 1 to that friendly operative's APL and, until the end of that operative's next activation, add [CIRCLE] to that friendly operative's Movement characteristic.

operatives.description: It is rare but not unknown for a Sister to fail in her duty, suffering disgrace as a result. Those who do are offered a change of redemption. Stripped of armour, they are sent to wreak penintent slaughter upon the enemy with cleaving blows from brutal eviscerators.
operatives.keywords: ECCLESIARCHY, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, ADEPTA SORORITAS, <ORDER>, REPENTIA, SISTER

abilities.title: Solace In Anguish
abilities.description: Each time this operative would lose a wound, roll 1D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

fireteams.fireteamcomp:
A REPENTIA fire team includes five SISTER REPENTIA operatives.
If your kill team does not include any other LEADER operatives, instead of selecting one SISTER REPENTIA operative for one REPENTIA fire team, you can select one REPENTIA SUPERIOR operative.

killteams.description:
Elucia Vhane is a scion of a noble mercantile dynasty. Leaving behind her family's operations in the galactic North, Vhane led her Elucidian Starstriders to the Eastern Fringe. There, the bold Rogue Trader seeks to eclipse the rich history of her ancestors with her own rise to glory - or die trying.

Rogue Traders are natural-born leaders, merchants of death and talented explorers with a keen eye for profit and survival. Each carries an heirloom Warrant of Trade. This priceless and sacred item, as individual in form as the Rogue Trader themselves, entitles them to travel beyond the boundaries of the Imperium - into dangerous wilderness space, regions controlled by secessionists and xenos, or even beyond the fringes of the galaxy itself.

strat.description:
Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative makes a shooting attack against a target within [PENT] of it,
in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your Attack dice.

Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative (excluding CANID operative) performs a Normal Move action,
it can move an additional [TRI] for that move, but must finish that move closed to your opponent's drop zone.

Place one of your Claim tokens anywhere in the killzone.
Each time a friendly ELUCIDAN STARSTRIDER operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack against an enemy operative within [SQUARE] of that token,
before rolling your Attack dice, you can retain one as a successful normal hit without rolling it.
At the end of the Turning Point, remove that Claim token.

Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative that is within [CIRCLE] of an objective marker or within [PENT] of your opponent's drop zone fights in combat or a shooting attack is made against it,
in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat or shooting attack, you can halve the damage inflicted on that friendly operative (rounding up) from one of your opponent's successful hits.

tac.description:
Use this Tactical Ploy after rolling your Attack dice for a shooting attack made by a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative.
If the target of that attack is an enemy operative that was targeted by another ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative with a shooting attack during that Turning Point,
you can re-roll any or all of your Attack dice for that shooting attack.

Use this Tactical Ploy when a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS operative is activated.
Add 1 to its APL.

Use this Tactical Ploy when a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative more than [SQUARE] from enemy operatives is activated.
That friendly operative regains 4 lost wounds. 
You can only use this Tactical Ploy for each friendly operative once.

Use this Tactical Ploy when a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS operative is activated.
Select one other ready friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS operative Visible To and within [PENT] of that operative that is eligible to be activated.
After that first friendly operative has been activated, you can immediately activate that other friendly operative.

equipments.eqdescription:
The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

Flash Visor: You can ignore any or all modifiers to this operative's APL and it is not affected by the Stun critical hit rule.

VOIDSMAN or VOIDMASTER operative only.
Improve the operative's Save characteristic to 4+ for the battle.
Add 1 to both Damage characteristics of Lasguns and Laspistols this operative is equipped with for the battle.

The operative can perform the following action during the battle:

Concussion Grenade (1 AP):
Select one point on the killzone within [PENT] of this operative. Roll 1D6 for each operative within [CIRCLE] of that point, subtracting 1 from the result if that operative is not Visible To this operative. On a 4+, sutract 1 from that operative's APL. This operative can only perform this action once, and cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:
Name A BS D
Frag Grenade 4 3+ 2/3
Special Rules
Rng [PENT], Blast [CIRCLE], Lim, Indirect

The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:
Name A BS D
Krak Grenade 4 3+ 4/5
Special Rules
Rng [PENT], AP1, Lim, Indirect, No Overwatch

profiles.SR: Rng [PENT], AP1, Indirect, Lim, No Overwatch

equipments.eqdescription:
Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat or makes a shootingattack, if it is within [PENT] of a friendly ELUCIA VHANE operative, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, before rolling your attack dice, you can retain one as a successful normal hit without rolling it.

Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack against an enemy operative within [PENT] of it, ranged weapons it is equipped with have the No Cover special rule for that shooting attack.

Battle Honour
 Ranged weapons this operative is equipped with gain the Balanced special rule.

Battle Honour
 Once per battle, when this operative is activated, you can use the Daring Tactical Ploy without spending any Command Points

Battle Honour
 Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, if this operative is within [PENT] of an enemy operative and more than [SQUARE] from all other friendly operatives, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can retain one successful normal save as a critical save instead.

Battle Honour
 In the Select Equipment step, when selecting equipment frrom your stash, you can select one item of equipment. Every operative with this Battle Honour that can be equipped with that item can do so for one less equipment point each (to a minimum of OEP).

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, the enemy operative in that combat cannot be supported.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, if any friendly operatives are supporting them, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of their melee weapons for that combat.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Add 1 to the Critical Damage characteristic of this operative’s melee weapons.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, subtract 1 from the Weapon Skill characteristic of the enemy operative for that combat.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, if you retain any critical hits, you can inflict one Mortal Wound on the enemy operative in that combat.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Add 2 to this operative’s Wounds characteristic.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is the target of a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can change one of your opponent's retained critical hits to a normal hit.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 When determining control of an objective marker, treat this operative’s APL characteristic as being 1 higher. Note that this is not a modifier.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 This operative is never injured.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is the target of a shooting attack, in the roll defence dice step of that shooting attack, ignore the AP1 special rule.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative would lose a wound as a result of a mortal wound or critical damage, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, if you roll any critical hits, inflict one mortal wound on the target.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative performs an Overwatch action, for that action’s shooting attack, do not worsen the Ballistic Skill characteristic of its ranged weapons as a result of performing an Overwatch action.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, when determining if the intended target is in Cover, Cover lines ignore the bases of all other operatives.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, when determining if the intended target is in Cover, Cover lines ignore the bases of all other operatives.Each time this operative performs a Shoot action, when you would retain attack dice for that action’s shooting attack, if it has not performed a Normal Move, Fall Back or Charge action during that activation, you can select one of your results of 5+ to be retained as a critical hit.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Once per Turning Point, after this operative makes a shooting attack while on a Vantage Point, if the target did not lose any wounds as a result of that shooting attack, repeat that shooting attack.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is activated, so long as it does not perform a Shoot or Fight action during that activation, it can perform one free Dash action.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 This operative can perform a Dash action more than once during its Activation. In addition, it automatically passes Jump tests and does not need to spend [CIRCLE] to traverse.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 When this operative is activated during the first Turning Point, you can change its order.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 During the Set Up Operatives step of the mission sequence, this operative can be set up within of your drop zone.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is the target of a shooting attack, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if it has a Conceal order, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative performs a Normal Move or Dash action, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy operatives, but cannot finish that move within Engagement Range of them. Each time this operative performs a Charge action, so long as it finishes that move within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, it can move within Engagement Range of any enemy operatives during that move.

Rare Equipment
The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle. It cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.
Name A BS D
Archeotech Grenade 4 3+ 2/2
Special Rules
Rng [PENT], Indirect, Lethal 4+, Lim, No Overwatch, MW3

profiles.SR: Rng [PENT], Indirect, Lethal 4+, Lim, No Overwatch, MW2

equipments.eqdescription:
Rare Equipment
VOIDSMAN operative only. Select a rotor cannon the operative is equipped with. That weapon gains the Relentless special rule for the battle.

Rare Equipment
REJUVENAT ADEPT operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Medicae Servo-Unit: For the purposes of this operative's Healing Serum action, you can select one friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative within [PENT] of this operative (instead of Visible To and within [TRI].

Rare Equipment
CANID operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Aggression Serum: You can ignore any or all modifiersto this operative's Movement characteristic. In addition, the vicious bite this operative is equipped with gains the Relentless special rule for the battle.

Rare Equipment
CANID operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Relic Voltagheist Generator: This operative has a 3+ Invulnerable Save.

Rare Equipment
The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Support Uplink: Each time you make a shooting attack with a Privateer Support Asset, you can determine Line of Sight from this operative (even if it isn't a NAVIS or ELUCIA VHANE operative). If you do so, enemy operatives are not Obscured for that shooting attack.

Rare Equipment
This ranged weapon gains the Ceaseless special rule.

Rare Equipment
This ranged weapon gains the P1 critical hit rule.

Rare Equipment
This ranged weapon gains the Rending special rule.

Rare Equipment
Add 1 to both Damage characteristics of this ranged weapon.

Rare Equipment
This ranged weapon gains the No Cover special rule.

Rare Equipment
Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this ranged weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, for each critical hit you retain, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

Rare Equipment
Add 1 to both Damage characteristics of this melee weapon.

Rare Equipment
This melee weapon gains the Brutal special rule.

Rare Equipment
This melee weapon gains the Balanced special rule.

Rare Equipment
This melee weapon gains the Rending special rule.

Rare Equipment
This melee weapon gains the Lethal 5+ special rule.

Rare Equipment
This melee weapon gains the Stun critical hit rule.

killteams.killteamcomp:
An ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER kill team is composed of the following operatives.
Note that unlike other kill teams, you do not select your operatives from a list; instead, this kill team's operatives are as specified.
  • 1 ELUCIA VHANE
  • 1 CANID
  • 1 DEATH CULT EXECUTIONER
  • 1 LECTRO-MAESTER
  • 1 REJUVENAT ADEPT
  • 1 VOIDMASTER
  • 3 VOIDSMAN equipped with a Lasgun and Gun Butt
  • 1 VOIDSMAN equipped with a Rotor Cannon and Gun Butt
ELUCIA VHANE can only be added to your roster or dataslate once.

operatives.description: Once master of the New Dawn, the Rogue Trader Elucia Vhane comes from an ancient dynasty. Her familial training honed her innate leadership and she wields her cane-rapier, Blur, as a master duellist. Ever does she keep an eye out for foes via a multi-spectral auspicator.
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, ASTRA CARTOGRAPHICA, LEADER, ELUCIA VHANE

abilities.title: Disruption Field
abilities.description: This operative has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.title: Merciless
abilities.description:
Each time this operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack, if it is against an enemy operative that has fewer than its starting number of Wounds remaining, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack,
you can re-roll one of your Attack dice.

abilities.title: Predator
abilities.description: Each time this operative is activated, it can perform a free Fight or Shoot action during that activation.

abilities.title: Warrant Of Trade
abilities.description:
Warrants Of Trade grant Rogue Traders a level of independence and authority that few within the Imperium possess. They offer great power and influence, allowing their hereditary holders to operate on their own terms and at their own discretion. As such, there are few bars to these adventurers' ambitions.
 Up to three times per game, you can use a Warrant Of Trade ability (below). Each ability specifies when it can be used, you must inform your opponent when you do so, and you cannot use the same ability more than once per game.
  • Coerce
    When: In the Select Drop Zone step, after rolling off to decide Attacker and Defender
    Effect: You can re-roll your dice.
  • Coordinate
    When: At the end of the Select a Kill Team step.
    Effect: Add 1 CP to your pool.
  • Adaptable Terms
    When: At the start of the Select Tac Ops step.
    Effect: You can select Tac Ops from two of your Archetypes (rather than one).
  • Consideration
    When: At the start of the Select Equipment step.
    Effect: You can select 6 additional points of equipment for the battle.
  • Explore
    When: At the end of the Scouting step.
    Effect: Select and resolve an additional scouting option. It must be a different option to your original selection, and initiative is still determined by your original selection. If both players have this or a simiar ability, the Defender resolves this ability first.
  • Seize
    When: In the Initiative phase, after rolling off to determine Initiative.
    Effect: You can re-roll your dice.

operatives.description: Countless strains of Canid are bred or vat-grown to fulfil hunting, attack, or intimidation roles, and many Rogue Traders appreciate the combination of loyalty and aggression. Elucia Vhane named her beast Aximillion - her Voidsmen-at-Arms training it as guardian and companion.
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, CANID

uniqueactions.title: Retrieve
uniqueactions.description:
Perform a free Dash, Fall Back, or Normal Move action with this operative.
At any point during that move, you can perform the Pick Up action for free with this operative, and any remaining increments of movement can be used after it does so.

abilities.title: Canid
abilities.description:
This operative cannot perform mission actions and cannot be equipped with equipment (unless CANID operative is specified).
Each time this operative is activated, it can ignore the first distance of [CIRCLE] it travels for a Climb, Drop, or Traverse during that activation.

abilities.title: Loyal Companion
abilities.description:
Each time an enemy operative performs a Fight action, if this operative is a valid target, you can select this operative as the target instead.
Each time an enemy operative finishes a Charge action within Engagement Range of another friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative within [SQUARE] of this operative,
if this operative is not within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, this operative can perform a free Charge action, but must finish that move within Engagement Range of that enemy operative.

operatives.description: For a Death Cult Executioner, the act of living is a blasphemy only balanced by the tally of souls they reap. They deliver death up close and master numerous combat styles. A follower of Vhane, the Death Cult Executioner Knosso Prond has vowed to kill a thousand different xenos.
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, DEATH CULT EXECUTIONER

uniqueactions.title: Assassin
uniqueactions.description: Change this operative's order. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

abilities.title: Duellist
abilities.description: Each time this operative fights in combat, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, you can resolve one successful hit before the Attacker. If you do so, that successful hit must be used to parry.

abilities.title: Rapid Reflexes
abilities.description: This operative has a 5+ Invulnerable Save.

abilities.title: Zealot
abilities.description: Each time this operative would lose a wound, roll 1D6. On a 6, that wound is not lost.

operatives.description: Habouring a connection to the Motive Force, these Tech-Priests are followers of the Cult Mechanicus, able to generate a protective voltagheist field from the mechanism on their back. Lectro-Maester Larsen van der Gauss joined Vhane's explorations for the change of esoteric discoveries.
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, LECTRO-MAESTER

uniqueactions.title: Voltagheist Charge
uniqueactions.description:
Until the end of the Turning Point, the Voltaic Pistol this operative is equipped with gains the Lethal 4+ special rule.
This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, 
or if it has performed the Voltagheist Field action during this Turning Point.

uniqueactions.title: Voltagheist Field
uniqueactions.description:
Until the end of the Turning Point, each time an enemy operative ends a move within [CIRCLE] of this operative,
inflict D6 Mortal Wounds on that enemy operative.
This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, 
or if it has performed the Voltagheist Charge action during this Turning Point.

abilities.title: Missionary Of The Martian Creed
abilities.description: Once per Turning Point, during this operative's activation, it can perform a mission action for one less Action point (to a minimum of 0 AP).

abilities.title: Voltagheist Array
abilities.description: Each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative within 2[CIRCLE] of this operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.

operatives.description: These operatives are masters of healing and longevity. They provide pain-numbing agents and emergency surgery, even in the most horrific of environments. Rejuvenat Adept Sanistasia Minst took up with the Startstriders in her obsessive search for a panacea.
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, MEDIC, REJUVENAT ADEPT

uniqueactions.title: Healing Serum
uniqueactions.description:
Select one friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative Visible To and within [TRI] of this operative.
That operative regains D3+3 lost wounds.
An operative cannot be selected for this if it was revived using the Battlefield Surgery ability during the same Turning Point.
This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

abilities.title: Battlefield Surgery
abilities.description:
Once per Turning Point, the first time another friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative would be incapacitated while Visible To and within [SQUARE] of this operative and not within Engagement Range fo an enemy operative,
if this operative is not within Engagement Range of an enemy operative this operative can revive it.
That friendly operative is not incapacitated, has 3 Wounds remaining, and if it was a shooting attack, any remaining attack dice are discarded.
That friendly operative can then perform a free Dash action, but must finish that move within [TRI] of this operative.
Subtract 1 from both operatives' APL.

abilities.title: Normaliser Helm
abilities.description: While a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operative is within [PENT] of this operative, it is not treated as being injured (only ignore the modifier to its Movement characteristic as a result of being injured if it is activated within [PENT] of this operative).

operatives.description: Voidmasters lead squads of naval soldiery. Barking commands to ensure fire discipline, their adherence to Naval codes is unwavering. Voidmaster Nitsch and his squad were seconded to Vhane from the warship Vengeance, and his bravery under fire is legendary.
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, VOIDMASTER

uniqueactions.title: Uncompromising Fire
uniqueactions.description:
Make a shooting attack with the Laspistol and make a shooting attack with the Close Range profile of the Artificer Shotgun this operative is equipped with (in any order).
This action is treated as a Shoot action.
This operative cannot perform this action if it has a Conceal order or while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

abilities.title: Disciplinarian
abilities.description: While a friendly VOIDSMAN operative is withing 2[CIRCLE] of this operative, weapons that friendly operative is equipped with gain the Balanced special rule.

abilities.title: Hardy
abilities.description: Once per battle, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of a combat or shooting attack, you can ignore the damage inflicted on this operative from one attack die.

operatives.description: Voidsmen commonly serve on warships, slaying any who threaten their vessel or its crew. Girded in baroque armour, they keep enemies at bay with las-fire. Among Voidmaster Nitsch's squad, the veteran Stromian Grell bears a rotor cannont by right of his consistent fire patterns.
operatives.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, VOIDSMAN

operatives.description:
Even the lowest Rogue Trader has their own well-appointed ship, and many operate entire fleets.
Such ships are often armed far in excess of their size to see off pirates, xenos, over-inquisitive officials or even to secure deals via literal gunboat diplomacy.
Most contain vast hangars that accommodate not only bulk haulers, but also atmospheric strikecraft.
Their precision firepower can be called upon by a Rogue Trader's elite operatives to ensure the success of clandestine missions.

fireteams.fireteamcomp:
An ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER kill team is composed of the following operatives.
Note that unlike other kill teams, you do not select your operatives from a list; instead, this kill team's operatives are as specified.
  • 1 ELUCIA VHANE
  • 1 CANID
  • 1 DEATH CULT EXECUTIONER
  • 1 LECTRO-MAESTER
  • 1 REJUVENAT ADEPT
  • 1 VOIDMASTER
  • 3 VOIDSMAN equipped with a Lasgun and Gun Butt
  • 1 VOIDSMAN equipped with a Rotor Cannon and Gun Butt
ELUCIA VHANE can only be added to your roster or dataslate once.

killteams.description:
The Adeptus Mechanicus is the official Imperial name within the Adeptus Terra for the Cult Mechanicus or Cult of the Machine based on Mars which provides the Imperium with its scientists, engineers and technicians.

The tech-adepts of the Mechanicus are the primary keepers of what is viewed as sacred wisdom, a privileged caste of Tech-priests who jealously guard the knowledge required to maintain and construct much of the Imperium's advanced technology.

  • Each time a friendly FORGE WORLD operative performs a Normal Move or Charge action, it can move an additional [TRI].
  • Each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly FORGE WORLD operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you must re-roll one of your successful saves
You can only use this Strategic Ploy once.

  • Subtract [CIRCLE] from the Movement characteristic of friendly FORGE WORLD operatives
You can only use this Strategic Ploy once.

Until the end of the turning point:

  • Each time a friendly FORGE WORLD operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you must re-roll one of your successful hits

tac.description: Use this Tactical Ploy when you activate a ready friendly FORGE WORLD LEADER operative. Select one other ready friendly FORGE WORLD operative Visible to and within [SQUARE] of that LEADER operative. At the end of that LEADER operative's activation, you can activate that other ready friendly operative.

Use this Tactical Ploy at the start of the Firefight phase. Select one enemy operative Visible to and within [PENT] of a friendly INFILTRATOR operative.
Until the end of the Turning Point, that enemy operative cannot be activated until another enemy operative has been activated (unless it is the only remaining enemy operative).

equipments.eqdescription:
The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Cense Bearer: Each time a friendly FORGE WORLD operative within [CIRCLE] of and visible to this operative is activated, if it is injured, do not subtract [CIRCLE] from its Movement characteristic for that activation.

The operative can perform the following action during the battle:
Data-Tether (1 AP):
You gain 1 CP. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives.

The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Enhanced Bionics: Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your defence dice results of 1

The operative can perform the following action during the battle:
Omni Spex (1 AP)
Select one friendly FORGE WORLD operative within [SQUARE] of and Visible to this operative, then select one enemy operative. Until the end of the Turning Point, each time that friendly operative makes a shooting attack, for that shooting attack:
  • That enemy operative is not Obscured
  • If that enemy operative is the target, that friendly operative's ranged weapons have the No Cover special rule
This operative cannot perform a Shoot or Fight action in the same activation in which it performs this action. An operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives.

The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Servo-Skull: This operative can perform mission actions for one less AP (to a minimum of 0 AP).

RANGER or VANGUARD operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Uplinked Vid-Feed: Each time this operative perform an Overwatch action, for that action's shooting attack, do not worsen the Ballistic Skill characteristc of its ranged weapons as a result of performing an Overwatch action.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, the enemy operative in that combat cannot be supported.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, if any friendly operatives are supporting them, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of their melee weapons for that combat.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, subtract 1 from the Weapon Skill characteristic of the enemy operative for that combat.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, if you retain any critical hits, you can inflict one Mortal Wound on the enemy operative in that combat.

 This operative is never injured.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative would lose a wound as a result of a mortal wound or critical damage, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative performs an Overwatch action, for that action’s shooting attack, do not worsen the Ballistic Skill characteristic of its ranged weapons as a result of performing an Overwatch action.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, when determining if the intended target is in Cover, Cover lines ignore the bases of all other operatives.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, when determining if the intended target is in Cover, Cover lines ignore the bases of all other operatives.Each time this operative performs a Shoot action, when you would retain attack dice for that action’s shooting attack, if it has not performed a Normal Move, Fall Back or Charge action during that activation, you can select one of your results of 5+ to be retained as a critical hit.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Once per Turning Point, after this operative makes a shooting attack while on a Vantage Point, if the target did not lose any wounds as a result of that shooting attack, repeat that shooting attack.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is activated, so long as it does not perform a Shoot or Fight action during that activation, it can perform one free Dash action.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 This operative can perform a Dash action more than once during its Activation. In addition, it automatically passes Jump tests and does not need to spend [CIRCLE] to traverse.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 When this operative is activated during the first Turning Point, you can change its order.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 During the Set Up Operatives step of the mission sequence, this operative can be set up within of your drop zone.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is the target of a shooting attack, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if it has a Conceal order, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative performs a Normal Move or Dash action, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy operatives, but cannot finish that move within Engagement Range of them. Each time this operative performs a Charge action, so long as it finishes that move within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, it can move within Engagement Range of any enemy operatives during that move.

killteams.killteamcomp:
A FORGE WORLD kill team consists of two fireteams selected from the following list:
  • SKITARII RANGER
  • SKITARII VANGUARD
  • SICARIAN

operatives.description: Princeps lead coordinated assaults under cover of their insidious auras. Once Sicarians, their worth to the Machine God led them to be rebuilt from destruction.
operatives.keywords: FORGE WORLD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, SICARIAN, INFILTRATOR, PRINCEPS

operatives.description: Experts in penetrating enemy strongholds, Sicarian Infiltrators emit a white noise that attacks their foes' sensoriums with a painful neurostatic bombardment.
operatives.keywords: FORGE WORLD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, SICARIAN, INFILTRATOR, TROOPER

operatives.description: Excelling in assassination missions and surprise attacks, Princeps lead their Ruststalkers in the hu8nt for any their Tech-Priest masters have marked for death.
operatives.keywords: FORGE WORLD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, LEADER, SICARIAN, RUSTSTALKER, PRINCEPS

operatives.description: The Ruststalkers fall upon their foes in a stabbing, slashing frenzy. Their transonic blades are wielded in a blur of attacks, capable of bypassing armour.
operatives.keywords: FORGE WORLD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, SICARIAN, RUSTSTALKER, TROOPER

fireteams.fireteamcomp:
A SICARIAN fire team includes four SICARIAN operatives selected from the following list:
  • SICARIAN RUSTSTALKER TROOPER each separately equipped with one of the following options:
    • Chordclaw and Transonic Razor, or Transonic Blades
  • SICARIAN INFILTRATOR TROOPER each separately equipped with one option from each of the following:
    • Flechette Blaster or Stubcarbine
    • Power Weapon of Taser Goad
If your kill team does not include any other LEADER operatives, instead of selecting one SICARIAN TROOPER operative for one SICARIAN fire team, you can either select one SICARIAN RUSTSTALKER PRINCEPS operative equipped with one of the following:
  • Chordclaw and Transonic Razor, or Transonic Blades
Or one SICARIAN INFILTRATOR PRINCEPS operative equipped with one option from each of the following:
  • Flechette Blaster or Stubcarbine
  • Power Weapon or Taser Goad

operatives.description: Ranger Alphas are the most dedicated of their kind, relied upon to formulate reconnaissance and hunting parameters, and to lead their unit in gruelling duties.
operatives.keywords: FORGE WORLD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, LEADER, SKITARII, RANGER, ALPHA

operatives.description: In the hunt for the most dangerous of hereteks or xeons aggressors, a forge world's ruling Tech-Priests may issue high-performing Rangers with advanced weaponry. Strange, esoteric technologies power such armaments, rendering them lethal indeed to the Rangers' foes.
operatives.keywords: FORGE WORLD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, RANGER, GUNNER

operatives.description: Skitarii Rangers hunt the foes of the Machine God relentlessly, and their bionically enhanced stamina is legendary. They pursue like patient predators, inexorably tracking their prey before taking the killing shot with their long rifles of ancient design.
operatives.keywords: FORGE WORLD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, RANGER, TROOPER

fireteams.fireteamcomp:
A SKITARII RANGER fire team includes five SKITARII RANGER operatives selected from the following list:
  • SKITARII RANGER TROOPER
  • SKITARII RANGER GUNNER equipped with: Gun Butt; Arc Rifle
  • SKITARII RANGER GUNNER equipped with: Gun Butt; Plasma Caliver
  • SKITARII RANGER GUNNER equipped with: Gun Butt; Transuranic Arquebus
Each SKITARII RANGER fire team can only include up to two SKITARII RANGER GUNNER operatives, each of which must be equipped with different ranged weapons.
If your kill team does not include any other LEADER operatives, one SKITARII RANGER fire team can also include one SKITARII RANGER ALPHA operative equipped with one of the following options:
  • Gun Butt; Galvanic Rifle
  • One option from each of the following:
    • Gun Butt; Galvanic Rifle
    • One option from each of the following:
      • Arc Pistol, Phosphor Blast Pistol, or Radium Pistol
      • Arc Maul, Power Weapon, or Taser Goad

operatives.description: Skitarii Alphas have passed a point called the Crux Mechanicus. With bodies more machine than flesh, they enact Tech-Priest overseers' orders like holy commands.
operatives.keywords: FORGE WORLD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, LEADER, SKITARII, VANGUARD, ALPHA

operatives.description: Many of the most powerful forge world weapons are potentially hazardous to the wielder. Vanguard marksmen, however, are already inured to the irradiating effects of their wargear - a price they willingly pay in devotion to their techno-arcane religion.
operatives.keywords: FORGE WORLD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, VANGUARD, GUNNER

operatives.description: Skitarii Vanguard are so infused with baleful energies that simply being near them is deadly. So much radiation bleeds out from their shells fired by their Radium Carbines that they contaminate the air around them, as well as their targets.
operatives.keywords: FORGE WORLD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, VANGUARD, TROOPER

fireteams.fireteamcomp:
A SKITARII VANGUARD fire team includes five SKITARII VANGUARD operatives selected from the following list:
  • SKITARII VANGUARD TROOPER
  • SKITARII VANGUARD GUNNER equipped with: Gun Butt; Arc Rifle
  • SKITARII VANGUARD GUNNER equipped with: Gun Butt; Plasma Caliver
  • SKITARII VANGUARD GUNNER equipped with: Gun Butt; Transuranic Arquebus
Each SKITARII VANGUARD fire team can only include up to two SKITARII VANGUARD GUNNER operatives, each of which must be equipped with different ranged weapons.
If your kill team does not include any other LEADER operatives, one SKITARII VANGUARD fire team can also include one SKITARII VANGUARD ALPHA operative equipped with one of the following options:
  • Gun Butt; Radium Carbine
  • One option from each of the following:
    • Gun Butt; Galvanic Rifle
    • One option from each of the following:
      • Arc Pistol, Phosphor Blast Pistol, or Radium Pistol
      • Arc Maul, Power Weapon, or Taser Goad

killteams.description:
The Grey Knights are a secret and mysterious Chapter of Space Marines specifically tasked with combating the dangerous daemonic entities of the Warp and all those who wield the corrupt power of the Chaos Gods.

They were created by the Emperor Himself with the aid of Malcador the Sigillite at the time of the Horus Heresy to serve as Humanity's greatest weapon against the threat posed by the existence of Chaos.

strat.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly GREY KNIGHT operative is activated, if it does not perform a Fight action during that activation, it can perform two Shoot actions during that activation if a bolt weapon is selected for each of those shooting attacks.

Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly GREY KNIGHT operative is activated, if it does not perform a Shoot action during that activation, it can perform two Fight actions during that activation.
Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly GREY KNIGHT operative performs a Charge action, it can move an additional [TRI] for that action.

Until the end of the Turning Point, each time an enemy operative on a Vantage Point makes a shooting attack,
each friendly GREY KNIGHT operative that has a Conceal order, is in Cover provided by Light terrain and is more than [PENT] from that enemy operative cannot be treated as being on an Engage order for that shooting attack as a result of that Vantage Point.

tac.ployname: And They Shall Know No Fear
tac.description: Use this Tactical Ploy when a friendly GREY KNIGHT operative is activated. Until the end of that operative's activation, you can ignore any or all modifiers to its APL characteristic and it is not Injured.

tac.ployname: Only In Death Does Duty End
tac.description:
Use this Tactical Ploy when a friendly GREY KNIGHT operative is incapacitated.
That operative is not removed from the killzone until the end of your next activation or the end of the battle (whichever comes first) and does not count as being injured.

equipments.eqdescription:
The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Hexagrammic Ward: Once per battle, when an enemy operative that is Visible to this operative performs a psychic action, this operative can use this ability. If it does so, roll 1D6: On a 3+, that action's psychic power is not resolved (the action points subtracted for that action are not refunded).
Select one Storm Bolter this operative is equipped with. Add 1 that that weapon's Damage characteristic for the battle.

The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:
Name A BS D
Psyk-Out Grenade 4 3+ 1/1
Special Rules
Rng [PENT], Lim, Blast [CIRCLE], Indirect, Psyk-Out*
* Psyk-Out: Each time a shooting attack is made with this weapon, if the target has the PSYKER or DAEMON keyword, for that shooting attack, change its Damage characteristic to 3/5 and it has the Lethal 5+ Special Rule.

profiles.SR: Rng [PENT], Lim, Blast [CIRCLE], Indirect, Psyk-Out*, No Overwatch

Purity Seal: Once per battle, when this operative is fighting in combat, making a shooting attack, or a shooting attack is being made against it, you can use the Command Re-Roll Tactical Ploy (see the Kill Team Core Book) without spending any CP.

Sanctic Blessing: Once per battle, during this operative's activation, it can perform a free Manifest Psychic Power action.
This operative has a Save characteristic of 2+ for the battle.
