killteams.killteamcomp:
A GREY KNIGHT kill team includes one GREY KNIGHT JUSTICAR operative equipped with a Storm Bolter and one of the following options:
  • Nemesis Daemon Hammer, Nemesis Falchions, Nemesis Force Weapon, or Nemesis Warding Stave
It also includes five GREY KNIGHT operatives selected from the following list:
  • GREY KNIGHT WARRIOR equipped with a Storm Bolter and one of the following options:
    • Nemesis Daemon Hammer, Nemesis Falchions, Nemesis Force Weapon, or Nemesis Warding Stave
    • GREY KNIGHT GUNNER equipped with Fists and one of the following options:
    • Incinerator, Psilencer, or Psycannon
Your kill team can only include up to one GREY NIGHT GUNNER operative.

operatives.description: It takes years of intensive training for a Grey Knight to master the psychically charged specialist weapons of their Chapter, but those who do are capable of unleashing barrages of esoteric firepower that rip through the heaviest opposition.
operatives.keywords: GREY KNIGHT, IMPERIUM, SANCTIC ASTARTES, <BROTHERHOOD>, PSYKER, GUNNER

uniqueactions.title: Astral Aim
uniqueactions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, this operative's ranged weapons gain the No Cover special rule.

uniqueactions.title: Armoured Resilience
uniqueactions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, improve this operative's Save characteristic by 1.

uniqueactions.title: Hammerhand
uniqueactions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time this operative fights in combat, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, the first time it strikes, inflict 1 additional damage on the target.

operatives.description: Justicars are the lynchpin of their team. In psychic communion, they lead their brothers in carefully divined tactical ploys, arcane battle rites, and psychic rituals.
operatives.keywords: GREY KNIGHT, IMPERIUM, SANCTIC ASTARTES, <BROTHERHOOD>, PSYKER, LEADER, JUSTICAR

uniqueactions.title: Astral Aim
uniqueactions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, this operative's ranged weapons gain the No Cover special rule.

uniqueactions.title: Armoured Resilience
uniqueactions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, improve this operative's Save characteristic by 1.

uniqueactions.title: Hammerhand
uniqueactions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time this operative fights in combat, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, the first time it strikes, inflict 1 additional damage on the target.

operatives.description: Grey Knights are martial elites clad in ward-etched armour. They combine the genetic augmentation of Space Marines with an indomitable psychic might, smiting those who traffic with the daemonic wherever they hide.
operatives.keywords: GREY KNIGHT, IMPERIUM, SANCTIC ASTARTES, <BROTHERHOOD>, PSYKER, WARRIOR

uniqueactions.title: Astral Aim
uniqueactions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, this operative's ranged weapons gain the No Cover special rule.

uniqueactions.title: Armoured Resilience
uniqueactions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, improve this operative's Save characteristic by 1.

uniqueactions.title: Hammerhand
uniqueactions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time this operative fights in combat, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, the first time it strikes, inflict 1 additional damage on the target.

fireteams.fireteamcomp:
A GREY KNIGHT kill team includes one GREY KNIGHT JUSTICAR operative equipped with a Storm Bolter and one of the following options:
  • Nemesis Daemon Hammer, Nemesis Falchions, Nemesis Force Weapon, or Nemesis Warding Stave
It also includes five GREY KNIGHT operatives selected from the following list:
  • GREY KNIGHT WARRIOR equipped with a Storm Bolter and one of the following options:
    • Nemesis Daemon Hammer, Nemesis Falchions, Nemesis Force Weapon, or Nemesis Warding Stave
    • GREY KNIGHT GUNNER equipped with Fists and one of the following options:
    • Incinerator, Psilencer, or Psycannon
Your kill team can only include up to one GREY NIGHT GUNNER operative.

killteams.description:
The Skitarii (sing. Skitarius), also known as the Tech-Guard and the Legiones Skitarii, are the cybernetic military forces of the Adeptus Mechanicus of the Imperium of Man.

To a man, the Skitarii are warriors born. They take pride in their holy work, glorying in the power of the Omnissiah as He drives them to ever greater feats. Reticules and calibrators pick out targets with uncanny accuracy, Galvanic Rifles bark and servitor-bullets find the skulls of the foe.

strat.description:
Doctrina Imperative
Optimisation: Add [TRI] to the Movement characteristic of friendly HUNTER CLADE operatives.
Deprecation: Each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative, defence dice cannot be automatically retained as a result of Cover (they must be rolled instead).

Doctrina Imperative
Optimisation: Each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, before any other rules take effect, if you rolled two or more failed saves, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.
Deprecation: Subtract [CIRCLE] from the Movement characteristic of friendly HUNTER CLADE operatives.

Doctrina Imperative
Optimisation: Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.
Deprecation: Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, before any other re-rolls, you must re-roll one of your critical hits (if any).

Doctrina Imperative
Optimisation: No effect.
Deprecation: No effect.

Doctrina Imperative
Optimisation: Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, before any other re-rolls, if you rolled two or more failed hits, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.
Deprecation: Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, before any other re-rolls, you must re-roll one of your critical hits (if any).

Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE RUSTSTALKER operative is activated:
  • It can perform a free Fight action during that activation
  • It can perform two Fight actions during that activation

Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative that is more than [PENT] from enemy operatives, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical saves, you can select one of your failed saves to be retained as a successful normal save.

Until the end of the Turning Point:
  • Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE VANGUARD operative that is within [CIRCLE] of an objective marker or within [PENT] of your opponent's drop zone makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your attack dice
  • Each time a friendl HUNTER CLADE RANGER operative that has not moved during the Turning Point makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooing attack, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

Until the end of the Turning Point, while an enemy operative is within [PENT] of a friendly HUNTER CLADE INFILTRATOR operative, each time that enemy operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your opponent cannot re-roll their attack dice.

tac.description: Use this Tactical Ploy when a ready friendly HUNTER CLADE operative is activated. Select one Doctrina Imperative that is not active for your kill team. Until the end of the Turning Point, that Imperative is treated as being active for that operative instad of the current active Imperative.

Use this Tactical Ploy in the Set Up Operatives step of the mission sequence. Select one friendly HUNTER CLADE INFILTRATOR operative.
That operative can be set up with a Conceal order anywhere in the killzone that is within [TRI] of Heavy terrain and more than [PENT] from enemy operatives and the enemy drop zone.
That operative cannot have its order changed during the first Turning Point as a result of the Infiltrate option in the Scouting sstep. You can only use this Tactical Ploy once.
Use this Tactical Ploy whe a ready friendly HUNTER CLADE operative is activated. That operative regains 1D3 lost wounds.

Use this Tactical Ploy in the Scouting step of the mission sequence, when you resolve your scouting option.
  • If you selected the Recon option, you can also perform a free Dash action with up to two friendly HUNTER CLADE RANGER operatives that are wholly within your drop zone
  • If you selected the Infiltrate option, during the first Turning Point, you can also change the order of up to two ready friendly HUNTER CLADE RANGER operatives when each of them are activated

equipments.eqdescription:
The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Cense Bearer: Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative within [SQUARE] of this operative is activated, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that friendly operative's Movement characteristic for that activation (excluding the modifier from the Bulwakr Imperative).

DIKTAT operative only. The operative can perfom the following action during the battle:
Command Uplink (2 AP): Add 1 CP to your pool. This operative cannot perform this action while within [PENT] of an enemy operative.

Select one Radium Carbine or Mastercrafted Radium Pistol the operative is equipped with. 
Add 1 to that weapon's Normal Damage characteristic for the battle.

The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Mechadendrites: Once per Turning Point, during this operative's activation, it can perfom the Pick Up action for one less AP (to a minimum of 0 AP).

RUSTSTALKER operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Optimised Gait: Each time this operative is activated, it can ignore the first distance of [CIRCLE] it travels for a climb, drop, or traverse during that activation.

LEADER operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Refractor Field: This operative has a 4+ Invulnerable Save.

The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Servo-Skull: Once per Turning Point, during this operative's activation, it can perfom a mission action for one less AP (to a minimum of 0 AP).

RANGER or VANGUARD operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Uplinked Vid-Feed: Each time this operative performs an Overwatch action, for that action's shooting attack, do not worsen the Ballistic Skill characteristic of its ranged weapons as a result of performing an Overwatch action.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, the enemy operative in that combat cannot be supported.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, if any friendly operatives are supporting them, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of their melee weapons for that combat.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Add 1 to the Critical Damage characteristic of this operative’s melee weapons.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, subtract 1 from the Weapon Skill characteristic of the enemy operative for that combat.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, if you retain any critical hits, you can inflict one Mortal Wound on the enemy operative in that combat.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Add 2 to this operative’s Wounds characteristic.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is the target of a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can change one of your opponent's retained critical hits to a normal hit.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 When determining control of an objective marker, treat this operative’s APL characteristic as being 1 higher. Note that this is not a modifier.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 This operative is never injured.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is the target of a shooting attack, in the roll defence dice step of that shooting attack, ignore the AP1 special rule.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative would lose a wound as a result of a mortal wound or critical damage, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, if you roll any critical hits, inflict one mortal wound on the target.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative performs an Overwatch action, for that action’s shooting attack, do not worsen the Ballistic Skill characteristic of its ranged weapons as a result of performing an Overwatch action.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, when determining if the intended target is in Cover, Cover lines ignore the bases of all other operatives.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, when determining if the intended target is in Cover, Cover lines ignore the bases of all other operatives.Each time this operative performs a Shoot action, when you would retain attack dice for that action’s shooting attack, if it has not performed a Normal Move, Fall Back or Charge action during that activation, you can select one of your results of 5+ to be retained as a critical hit.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Once per Turning Point, after this operative makes a shooting attack while on a Vantage Point, if the target did not lose any wounds as a result of that shooting attack, repeat that shooting attack.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is activated, so long as it does not perform a Shoot or Fight action during that activation, it can perform one free Dash action.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 This operative can perform a Dash action more than once during its Activation. In addition, it automatically passes Jump tests and does not need to spend [CIRCLE] to traverse.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 When this operative is activated during the first Turning Point, you can change its order.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 During the Set Up Operatives step of the mission sequence, this operative can be set up within of your drop zone.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is the target of a shooting attack, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if it has a Conceal order, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative performs a Normal Move or Dash action, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy operatives, but cannot finish that move within Engagement Range of them. Each time this operative performs a Charge action, so long as it finishes that move within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, it can move within Engagement Range of any enemy operatives during that move.

Rare Equipment
This ranged weapon gains the Ceaseless special rule.

Rare Equipment
This ranged weapon gains the P1 critical hit rule.

Rare Equipment
This ranged weapon gains the Rending special rule.

Rare Equipment
Add 1 to both Damage characteristics of this ranged weapon.

Rare Equipment
This ranged weapon gains the No Cover special rule.

Rare Equipment
Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this ranged weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, for each critical hit you retain, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

Rare Equipment
Add 1 to both Damage characteristics of this melee weapon.

Rare Equipment
This melee weapon gains the Brutal special rule.

Rare Equipment
This melee weapon gains the Balanced special rule.

Rare Equipment
This melee weapon gains the Rending special rule.

Rare Equipment
This melee weapon gains the Lethal 5+ special rule.

Rare Equipment
This melee weapon gains the Stun critical hit rule.

killteams.killteamcomp:
A HUNTER CLADE fire team includes the following operatives:
  • One HUNTER CLADE operative selected from the following list:
    • SKITARII RANGER ALPHA operative equipped with one of the following:
      • Galvanic Rifle; Gun Butt
      • Mastercrafted Radium Pistol; Power Weapon
      or one option from each of the following:
      • Arc Pistol or Phosphor Blast Pistol
      • Arc Maul or Taser Goad
    • SKITARII VANGUARD ALPHA operative equipped with one of the following:
      • Radium Carbine; Gun Butt
      • Mastercrafted Radium Pistol; Power Weapon
      or one option from each of the following:
      • Arc Pistol or Phosphor Blast Pistol
      • Arc Maul or Taser Goad
    • SICARIAN RUSTSTALKER PRINCEPS
    • SICARIAN INFILTRATOR PRINCEPS operative equipped with one option from each of the following:
      • Flechette Blaster or Stubcarbine
      • Power Weapon or Taser Goad
  • Ten HUNTER CLADE operatives selected from the following list:
    • SKITARII RANGER MARKSMAN
    • SKITARII RANGER DIKTAT
    • SKITARII RANGER GUNNER operative equipped with a Gun Butt and one of the following:
      • Arc Rifle, Plasma Caliver, or Transuranic Arquebus
    • SKITARII RANGER SURVEYOR
    • SKITARII VANGUARD SHOCKTROOPER
    • SKITARII VANGUARD DIKTAT
    • SKITARII VANGUARD GUNNER operative equipped with a Gun Butt and one of the following:
      • Arc Rifle, Plasma Caliver, or Transuranic Arquebus
    • SKITARII VANGUARD SURVEYOR
    • SICARIAN RUSTSTALKER ASSASSIN operative equipped with one of the following:
      • Chordclaw and Transonic Razor or Transonic Blades
    • SICARIAN INFILTRATOR TRACKER operative equipped with one option from each of the following:
      • Flechette Blaster or Stubcarbine
      • Power Weapon or Taser Goad
Your kill team cannot include more SICARIAN operatives than it does RANGER and VANGUARD operatives combined (but it can include the same)

Your Kill Team can only include up to three GUNNER operatives. Each GUNNER operative must be equipped with different ranged weapons.

Your Kill Team can only include up to one DIKTAT and one SURVEYOR operative.

If your kill team includes no more than four SICARIAN operatives, it can include one additional RANGER or VANGUARD operative (for 11 operatives in total)

Doctrina Imperatives

In the Strategy phase of the first Turning Point, when it is your turn to use a Strategic Ploy or pass, you must select one Doctrina Imperative below to become active for your kill team instead. That Imperative is active until the end of the battle, or until you change it to a different Imperative, whichever comes first.
In the Strategy phase of a subsequent Turning Point, when it is your turn to use a Strategic Ploy or pass, you can select one different Imperative below to become active for your kill team instead.
Each Imperative has an Optimisation and a Deprecation effect. Both are in effect while that Imperative is active for your kill team. Ignore each Imperative’s Deprecation effect during the first Turning Point that it is active for your kill team during the battle.

operatives.description: Sicarian Infiltrator Princeps have a greater detachment from emotion than even others of their kind. No hunting mission is too dangerous for them, and no assassination task too harrowing.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, LEADER, SICARIAN, INFILTRATOR, PRINCEPS

abilities.title: Data Prehensiles
abilities.description: Once per Turning Point, during this operative's activation, it can perform a mission action for one less AP (to a minimum of 0 AP). This is not cumulative with the Servo-Skull equipment.

operatives.description: Experts in penetrating enemy strongholds, Sicarian Infiltrator Trackers emit a white noise that attacks their foes' sensoriums with a painful neurostatic bombardment.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, SICARIAN, INFILTRATOR, TRACKER

operatives.description: Ruststalker Assassins fall upon their foes in a stabbing, slashing frenzy, unleashing a blur of attacks. They are selected for kill team duties due to their level of dogged determination to hunt quarries to the death, above and beyond others of their kind.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, SICARIAN, RUSTSTALKER, ASSASSIN

abilities.title: Wasteland Stalkers
abilities.description: Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, before rolling your defence dice, if it is in Cover, one additional die can be retained as a successful normal save as a result of Cover.

operatives.description: Excelling in assassination missions and surprise attacks, Princeps lead their Ruststalkers in the hunt for any theuir Tech-Priest masters have marked for death. In their lives, Princeps have claimed many foes in the most hazardous environments.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, LEADER, SICARIAN, RUSTSTALKER, PRINCEPS

abilities.title: Wasteland Stalkers
abilities.description: Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, before rolling your defence dice, if it is in Cover, one additional die can be retained as a successful normal save as a result of Cover.

operatives.description: Ranger Alphas are the most dedicated of their kind, relied upon to formulate reconnaissance and hunting parameters, and to lead their Hunter Clade in gruelling duties.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, LEADER, SKITARII, RANGER, ALPHA

profiles.SR: Rng [PENT], Blast [TRI], No Cover, No Overwatch

abilities.title: Control Edict
abilities.description: Once per Turning Point, when a ready friendly HUNTER CLADE operative is activated within [SQUARE] of this operative, you can select another ready friendly HUNTER CLADE operative within [SQUARE] of this operative that is eligible to be activated. After that first friendly operative has been activated, you can immediately activate that other friendly operative.

operatives.description: The enhanced data-tethers carried by these Skitarii enable them to communicate directly with their Tech-Priest masters. It is a great honour to be chosen to carry one, as it is seen as the mouthpiece of the Tech-Priests, who are said to be prophets of the Machine God itself.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, RANGER, DIKTAT

uniqueactions.title: Enhanced Data-Tether
uniqueactions.description: Select one friendly HUNTER CLADE operative Visible to and within [PENT] of this operative. Add 1 to its APL. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative

operatives.description: In the hunt for the most dangerous of hereteks or xenos aggressors, a forge world's ruling Tech-Priests may issue high-performing Hunter Clade Rangers with advanced weaponry. Strange, esoteric technologies power such armaments, redndering them lethal indeed to the Rangers' foes.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, RANGER, GUNNER

operatives.description: Skitarii Ranger Marksmen hunt the foes of the Machine God relentlessly, and their bionically enhanced stamina is legendary. They pursue like patient predators, inexorably tacking their prey before taking the killing shot with their long rifles of ancient design.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, RANGER, MARKSMAN

operatives.description: The omnispex wielded by these Skitarii is a device fitted with a Raptor-class machine spirit. This can glean all kinds of data from a killzone and from a Hunter Clade's enemies. Not only is it useful for the kill team in battle, but such information is a fine devotion to the Machine God itself.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, RANGER, SURVEYOR

uniqueactions.title: Omnispex
uniqueactions.description:
Select one friendly HUNTER CLADE operative Visible to and within [SQUARE] of this operative, then select one enemy operative. Until the end of the Turning Point, each time that friendly operative makes a shooting attack, for that shooting attack:
  • Areas of smoke have no effect when determining Line of Sight to that enemy operative
  • That enemy operative is not Obscured
  • If that enemy operative is the target, that friendly operative's ranged weapons have the No Cover special rule
This operative cannot perform this active while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

operatives.description: Skitarii Alphas have passed a point called the Crux Mechanicus. With bodies more machine than flesh, they enach Tech-Priests overseers' orders like holy commands
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, VANGUARD, GUNNER

profiles.SR: Rng [PENT], Blast [TRI], No Cover, No Overwatch

abilities.title: Control Edict
abilities.description: Once per Turning Point, when a ready friendly HUNTER CLADE operative is activated within [SQUARE] of this operative, you can select another ready friendly HUNTER CLADE operative within [SQUARE] of this operative that is eligible to be activated. After that first friendly operative has been activated, you can immediately activate that other friendly operative.

abilities.title: Rad-Saturation
abilities.description: While an enemy operative is Visible to and within [CIRCLE] of friendly operatives with this ability, that enemy operative is treated as being injured  (only subtract [CIRCLE] from that enemy operative's Movement characteristic as a result of it being injured if it is activated, Visible to, and within [CIRCLE] of friendly operatives with this ability).

operatives.description: To be a Diktat amond Skitarii is to be obeyed without question, due to their direct link with the Tech-Priests. Hunter Clades receiving word from their masters through these warriors are filled with zealous conviction, willing to drive through unimaginable terrors to find and slay their quarry.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, VANGUARD, DIKTAT

uniqueactions.title: Enhanced Data-Tether
uniqueactions.description: Select one friendly HUNTER CLADE operative Visible to and within [PENT] of this operative. Add 1 to its APL. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

abilities.title: Rad-Saturation
abilities.description: While an enemy operative is Visible to and within [CIRCLE] of friendly operatives with this ability, that enemy operative is treated as being injured  (only subtract [CIRCLE] from that enemy operative's Movement characteristic as a result of it being injured if it is activated, Visible to, and within [CIRCLE] of friendly operatives with this ability).

operatives.description: These Skitarii wield some of the most dangerous man-portable weapons in a forge world's arsenal - to the carrier as will as the Omnissiah's enemies. To have survived long enough to join a Hunter Clade while carrying this kind of weapon shows the Machine God's favour.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, VANGUARD, GUNNER

abilities.title: Rad-Saturation
abilities.description: While an enemy operative is Visible to and within [CIRCLE] of friendly operatives with this ability, that enemy operative is treated as being injured  (only subtract [CIRCLE] from that enemy operative's Movement characteristic as a result of it being injured if it is activated, Visible to, and within [CIRCLE] of friendly operatives with this ability).

operatives.description: So much radiation pours from these Skitarii and their ammunition that they contaminate the air around them. Showing toughness, resilience, and dauntless bravery above others of their kind, Vanguard Shocktroopers advance into the fray, securing key positions for their Hunter Clade.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, VANGUARD, SHOCKTROOPER

abilities.title: Rad-Saturation
abilities.description: While an enemy operative is Visible to and within [CIRCLE] of friendly operatives with this ability, that enemy operative is treated as being injured  (only subtract [CIRCLE] from that enemy operative's Movement characteristic as a result of it being injured if it is activated, Visible to, and within [CIRCLE] of friendly operatives with this ability).

operatives.description: The omnispex's machine spirit can read heat emissions, data signatures, and biological waveforms, even at extreme range. Should it be kept focused for an extended period, it will reveal the enemy's weaknesses. This is perfect for Hunter Clades, whose primary purpose is to eliminate key targets.
operatives.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, <FORGE WORLD>, SKITARII, VANGUARD, SURVEYOR

  • That enemy operative is not Obscured
  • If that enemy operative is the target, that friendly operative's ranged weapons have the No Cover special rule
This operative cannot perform this active while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

abilities.description: While an enemy operative is Visible to and within [CIRCLE] of friendly operatives with this ability, that enemy operative is treated as being injured  (only subtract [CIRCLE] from that enemy operative's Movement characteristic as a result of it being injured if it is activated, Visible to, and within [CIRCLE] of friendly operatives with this ability).

killteams.description:
The Astra Militarum, also known as the Imperial Guard in colloquial Low Gothic, is the largest coherent fighting force in the galaxy. They serve as the Imperium of Man's primary combat force and first line of defence from the myriad threats which endanger the existence of the Human race in the 41st Millennium.

It is comprised of countless billions of men and women -- hundreds of thousands of different regiments, supported by a vast array of light and heavy armoured vehicles that provide the Guard's primary offensive punch. The Astra Militarum are usually the first Imperial force to respond to a threat if a world's Planetary Defence Force (PDF) fails to suppress it.

strat.description:
Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly operative that was issued this Guardsman Order fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of 1.
Guardsman Order: Each time you use a Guardsman Order, all friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operatives in the kill zone and all friendly GUARDSMAN operatives within [PENT] and Visible to a friendly GUARDSMAN SERGEANT operative are issued that Guardsman Order.

Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly operative that was issued this Guardsman Order is activated, until the end of the activation, add [TRI] to its Movement characteristic.

Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly operative that was issued this Guardsman Order, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if it is in Cover, you can re-roll any or all of your defence dice results of 1.

tac.description:
Use this Tactical Ploy after a friendly IMPERIAL GUARD operative makes a shooting attack.
Until the end of the Turning Point, each time another friendly IMPERIAL GUARD operative makes a shooting attack against the target of that shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that subsequent shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice.

 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, when determining if the intended target is in Cover, Cover lines ignore the bases of all other operatives.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, when determining if the intended target is in Cover, Cover lines ignore the bases of all other operatives.Each time this operative performs a Shoot action, when you would retain attack dice for that action’s shooting attack, if it has not performed a Normal Move, Fall Back or Charge action during that activation, you can select one of your results of 5+ to be retained as a critical hit.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Once per Turning Point, after this operative makes a shooting attack while on a Vantage Point, if the target did not lose any wounds as a result of that shooting attack, repeat that shooting attack.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is activated, so long as it does not perform a Shoot or Fight action during that activation, it can perform one free Dash action.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 This operative can perform a Dash action more than once during its Activation. In addition, it automatically passes Jump tests and does not need to spend [CIRCLE] to traverse.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 When this operative is activated during the first Turning Point, you can change its order.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 During the Set Up Operatives step of the mission sequence, this operative can be set up within of your drop zone.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is the target of a shooting attack, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if it has a Conceal order, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative performs a Normal Move or Dash action, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy operatives, but cannot finish that move within Engagement Range of them. Each time this operative performs a Charge action, so long as it finishes that move within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, it can move within Engagement Range of any enemy operatives during that move.

killteams.killteamcomp:
An IMPERIAL GUARD kill team consists of two fire teams selected from the following list:
  • GUARDSMAN
  • TEMPESTUS SCION

operatives.description: Guardsman Sergeants coordinate their team with grizzled experience and tactical nous, enforcing their superiors' orders to ensure the success of the mission.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL GUARD, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, <REGIMENT>, LEADER, GUARDSMAN, GUNNER

operatives.description: Equipped with heavy vox-casters, comms specialists keep the team tethered to their regiment's rigid hierarchy of command, enabling them to relay their comanders' orders while reporting back on enemy troop movements or spotting for artillery.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL GUARD, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, <REGIMENT>, GUARDSMAN, COMMS

uniqueactions.title: Signal
uniqueactions.description:
Select one friendly GUARDSMAN operative within [PENT] and Visible to this operative.
Add 1 to the friendly operative's APL. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives.

abilities.title: Relay Orders
abilities.description:
Once in each Turning Point, when this operative is issued a Guardsman Order (see Strategic Ploys), it can relay it.
If an order is relayed, subtract 1 from this operative's APL and all friendly GUARDSMAN operatives in the kill zone are issued that order

operatives.description: These Guardsmen are often the team's sharpshooters, issued with additional  training for the heavier weaponry they carry, and supporting their fellow soldiers with devastating anti-armour firepower, incinerating blazes, and pinpoint sniper fire.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL GUARD, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, <REGIMENT>, GUARDSMAN, GUNNER

operatives.description: Grunts of the Imperial Guard, Guradsmen are recruited, trained, and equipped in their millions to doggedly fight wherever the Imperium needs them. They carry varying patterns of the dependable lasgun, along with any extra kit the manage to acquire.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL GUARD, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, <REGIMENT>, GUARDSMAN, TROOPER

fireteams.fireteamcomp:
A GUARDSMAN fire team includes seven GUARDSMAN operatives selected from the following list:
  • GUARDSMAN TROOPER
  • GUARDSMAN COMMS
  • GUARDSMAN GUNNER equipped with Bayonet and Flamer
  • GUARDSMAN GUNNER equipped with Bayonet and Grenade Launcher
  • GUARDSMAN GUNNER equipped with Bayonet and Meltagun
  • GUARDSMAN GUNNER equipped with Bayonet and Plasma Gun
  • GUARDSMAN GUNNER equipped with Bayonet and Sniper Rifle
Other than GUARDSMAN TROOPER operatives, each GUARDSMAN fire team can only include up to three of the operatives above. Other than GUARDSMAN TROOPER operatives, your kill team can only include each operative above once.
If your kill team does not include any other LEADER operatives, instead of selecting one GUARDSMAN TROOPER operative for one GUARDSMAN fire team, you can select one GUARDSMAN SERGEANT operative equipped with one option from each of the following:
  • Bolt Pistol, Laspistol, or Plasma Pistol
  • Chainsword or Power Weapon

operatives.description: Skilled tacticians and leaders, Tempestors design the kill zone insertions that the Scions are justifiably famed for. They are also granted prestige weapons normally reserved to high-rnaking officers, making them devastatingly effective fighters in their own right.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL GUARD, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, <TEMPESTUS REGIMENT>, LEADER, TEMPESTUS SCION, TEMPESTOR

abilities.title: Accomplished Leader
abilities.description: In each of your Strategy Phases, if this operative is in the kill zone, you can use one Strategic Ploy without spending any Command Points.

operatives.description: Bearing advanced vox-casters, these Scions provide updated tactical information, keeping their team in contact with regimental headquarters. Some are also trained in counter-intelligence and the interception of signals, allowing their team to outmanoeuvre the foe.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL GUARD, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, <TEMPESTUS REGIMENT>, TEMPESTUS SCION, TROOPER

uniqueactions.title: Signal
uniqueactions.description: Select one friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operative in the killzone. Add 1 to its APL. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives. This operative can perform this action more than once during its activation.

operatives.description: Tempestus Scions are an elite force within the Astra Militarum, equipped with specialist wargear to conduct dangerous missions. They typically bear high-powered hot-shot lasguns and wear dense carapace armour that provides extra protection in deadly kill zones.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL GUARD, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, <TEMPESTUS REGIMENT>, TEMPESTUS SCION, GUNNER

operatives.description: Tempestus Scions are an elite force within the Astra Militarum, equipped with specialist wargear to conduct dangerous missions. They typically bear high-powered hot-shot lasguns and wear dense carapace armour that provides extra protection in deadly kill zones.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL GUARD, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, <TEMPESTUS REGIMENT>, TEMPESTUS SCION, TROOPER

fireteams.fireteamcomp:
A TEMPESTUS SCION fire team includes five TEMPESTUS SCION operatives selected from the following list:
  • TEMPESTUS SCION TROOPER
  • TEMPESTUS SCION COMMS
  • TEMPESTUS SCION GUNNER equipped with Gun Butt and Flamer
  • TEMPESTUS SCION GUNNER equipped with Gun Butt and Grenade Launcher
  • TEMPESTUS SCION GUNNER equipped with Gun Butt and Hot-Shot Volely Gun
  • TEMPESTUS SCION GUNNER equipped with Gun Butt and Meltagun
  • TEMPESTUS SCION GUNNER equipped with Gun Butt and Plasma Gun
Each TEMPESTUS SCION fire team can only include up to two TEMPESTUS SCION GUNNER operatives. Other that TEMPESTUS SCION TROOPER operatives, your kill team can only include each operative above once.
If your kill team does not include any other LEADER operatives, instead of selecting one TEMPESTUS SCION TROOPER operative for one TEMPESTUS SCION fire team, you can select one TEMPESTOR operative equipped with one option from each of the following:
  • Bolt Pistol, Hot-Shot Laspistol, or Plasma Pistol
  • Chainsword, Power Fist, or Power Weapon

killteams.description: The fighting men and women of the Imperial Navy are called upon for many tasks, from garrisoning void ports to escorting the Navigator elite. The bravest and most daring of their ilk are selected for the Breacher teams – the blunt hammer at the head of a Navy boarding assault. Trained in close-quarters combat and equipped with a range of specialist equipment, these bold boarders smash apart anything in their way under a hail of shotgun fire, grenades, and axe blows.

strat.description:
Place one of your Attack Order tokens anywhere in the killzone.
Each time a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack while within [SQUARE] of that token,
in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of one result (e.g. results of 2).
At the end of the Turning Point, remove that Attack Order token.
You cannot use this Strategic Ploy in the same Turning Point in which you use the Defence Order Strategic Ploy.

Until the end of the Turning Point, each time an enemy operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack against a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative that hsa not performed a Charge, Fall Back, or Normal Move action during this Turning Point,
subtract 1 frrom both Damage characteristics of weapons that enemy operative is equipped with for that combat or shooting attack (to a minimum of 2).

Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack against a target within [SQUARE] of it, 
in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, if you retain two or more successful hits, you can retain one of your failed hits as a successful normal hit instead.

Place one of your Defence Order tokens anywhere in the killzone.
Each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative that is within [SQUARE] of that token, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your Defence Dice results of one result (e.g. results of 2).
At the end of the Turning Point, remove that Defence Order token.
You cannot use this Strategic Ploy in the same Turning Point in which you use the Attack Order Strategic Ploy.

tac.description:
Use this Tactical Ploy when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative performs a Fight or Shoot action against a target within [PENT] of it. In the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, before rolling your attack dice:
  • If it is the first friendly operative to be activated this Turning Point, you can retain one attack die as a critical hit without rolling it.
  • If it is the first friendly operative to perform either of those actions this Turning Point, you can retain one attack die as a successful normal hit without rolling it.

Use this Tactical Ploy when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative is activated.
Until the end of the battle, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that operative's Movement characteristic and to the BS and WS characteristics of the weapons it is equipped with.

Use this Tactical Ploy when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative is activated.
Select one objective marker. 
Until the end of the battle, when determining control of that objective marker, treat that operative's APL as being 1 higher.
Note that this is not a modifier.
In narrative play, this is cumulative with the Focused Battle Honour. 
You can only use this Tactical Ploy for each friendly operative once.

Use this Tactical Ploy when you use the Breach And Clear ability.
Select one of those friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operatives. Add 1 to its APL.

equipments.eqdescription:
The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:
Name A BS D
Frag Grenade 4 3+ 2/3
Special Rules
Rng [PENT], Blast [CIRCLE], Indirect, Limited

The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:
Name A BS D
Krak Grenade 4 3+ 4/5
Special Rules
Rng [PENT], Lim, AP1, Indirect, No Overwatch

profiles.SR: Rng [PENT], AP1, Indirect, Lim, No Overwatch

equipments.eqdescription:
The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Rebreather: You can ignore any or all modifiers to this operative's APL and it is not affected by the Stun critical hit rule.

Operative equipped with a Navis Shotgun only. In the Set Up operatives step, select a type of ammunition for this operative to have loaded into its Navis Shotgun for the battle: cartridges or slugs. If it has loaded cartridges, it uses either profile of its Navis Shotgun as normal. If it has loaded slugs, it can only use the Long Range profile of its Navis Shotgun, but add 1 to both Damage Characteristics of that profile and improve its BS characteristic by 1 for that operative.

The operative can perform the following action during the battle:
Load Shotgun (1 AP): Change the type of ammunition loaded into the Navis Shotgun this operative is equipped with.
Add 1 to this operative's Wounds characteristic for the battle.

The operative can perform the following action during the battle:
Stun Grenade (1 AP): Select one point on the kllzone within [PENT] of this operative. Roll 1D6 for each operative within [CIRCLE] of that point, subtracting 1 from the result if that operative is not Visible To this operative. On a 4+, subtract 1 from that operative's APL. This operative can only perform this action once, and cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

The ooperative gains the following ability for the battle:
System Override Device: In the Scouting step, after resolving your selection, you can open one Hatchway. If both players have this or a similar ability, the Defender resolves this ability first.

Battle Honour
This operative always treats the Close Assault Strategic Ploy as having been used.

Battle Honour
Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, if this operative is within range of an objective marker or one of your Tac Ops tokens, or is carrying an objective marker or one of your Tac Ops tokens, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, before rolling your Defence Dice, you can retain one a successful normal save without rolling it.

Battle Honour
Each time this operative performs the Operate Hatch action, roll 1D6: on a 3+, the action point subtracted for that action is refunded.

Battle Honour
Each time this operative fights in combat, if it is the active operative, its melee weapons have the Brutal special rule for that combat.

Battle Honour
Improve the Weapon Skill characteristic of melee weapons this operative is equipped with by 1 (to a maximum of 2+).

Battle Honour
Each time this operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack, if it is within [PENT] of your opponent's drop zone or killzone edge, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your Attack dice.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, the enemy operative in that combat cannot be supported.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, if any friendly operatives are supporting them, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of their melee weapons for that combat.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Add 1 to the Critical Damage characteristic of this operative’s melee weapons.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, subtract 1 from the Weapon Skill characteristic of the enemy operative for that combat.

Combat Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, if you retain any critical hits, you can inflict one Mortal Wound on the enemy operative in that combat.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Add 2 to this operative’s Wounds characteristic.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is the target of a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can change one of your opponent's retained critical hits to a normal hit.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 When determining control of an objective marker, treat this operative’s APL characteristic as being 1 higher. Note that this is not a modifier.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 This operative is never injured.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is the target of a shooting attack, in the roll defence dice step of that shooting attack, ignore the AP1 special rule.

Staunch Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative would lose a wound as a result of a mortal wound or critical damage, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, if you roll any critical hits, inflict one mortal wound on the target.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative performs an Overwatch action, for that action’s shooting attack, do not worsen the Ballistic Skill characteristic of its ranged weapons as a result of performing an Overwatch action.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, when determining if the intended target is in Cover, Cover lines ignore the bases of all other operatives.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative makes a shooting attack, when determining if the intended target is in Cover, Cover lines ignore the bases of all other operatives.Each time this operative performs a Shoot action, when you would retain attack dice for that action’s shooting attack, if it has not performed a Normal Move, Fall Back or Charge action during that activation, you can select one of your results of 5+ to be retained as a critical hit.

Marksman Specialist Battle Honour
 Once per Turning Point, after this operative makes a shooting attack while on a Vantage Point, if the target did not lose any wounds as a result of that shooting attack, repeat that shooting attack.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is activated, so long as it does not perform a Shoot or Fight action during that activation, it can perform one free Dash action.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 This operative can perform a Dash action more than once during its Activation. In addition, it automatically passes Jump tests and does not need to spend [CIRCLE] to traverse.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 When this operative is activated during the first Turning Point, you can change its order.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 During the Set Up Operatives step of the mission sequence, this operative can be set up within of your drop zone.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative is the target of a shooting attack, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if it has a Conceal order, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.

Scout Specialist Battle Honour
 Each time this operative performs a Normal Move or Dash action, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy operatives, but cannot finish that move within Engagement Range of them. Each time this operative performs a Charge action, so long as it finishes that move within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, it can move within Engagement Range of any enemy operatives during that move.

Rare Equipment
NAVIS SERGEANT-AT-ARMS operative only. Select a Power Weapon the operative is equipped with. That weapon gains the Balanced special rule for the battle.

Rare Equipment
NAVIS SERGEANT-AT-ARMS operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Navis Cuirass: Each time an enemy operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack against this operative, subtract 1 from both Damage Characteristics of weapons that operative is equipped with for that combat or shooting attack (to a minimum of 2). This is not cumulative with the Brace For Counter-Attack Strategic Ploy.

Rare Equipment
NAVIS GUNNER operative only. Select a Navis Las-Volley the operative is equipped with. That weapon gains the Rending special rule for the battle.

Rare Equipment
The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Remote Access Device: This operative can perform the Operate Hatch action while within [PENT] of a Hatchway's access point (instead of [TRI]), and can do so even if that Hatchway is open and an enemy operative is within [TRI] of its access point. An operative cannot use this ability and the Deckhand Battle Honour and/or Hatchcutter ability at the same time.

Rare Equipment
The operative gains the following ability for the battle:
Auspicator: Once per Turning Point, during this operative's activation, it can perform a mission action for one less Action point (to a minimum of 0 AP).

Rare Equipment
After the battle, in the Update Dataslates step, if this operative was not incapacitated during the battle, you can re-roll one Casualty test.

This ranged weapon gains the Ceaseless special rule.

Rare Equipment
This ranged weapon gains the P1 critical hit rule.

Rare Equipment
This ranged weapon gains the Rending special rule.

Add 1 to both Damage characteristics of this ranged weapon.

killteams.killteamcomp:
An IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHERS kill team is composed of:
  • 1 NAVIS SERGEANT-AT-ARMS operative equipped with the following:
    • Navis shotgun; Navis hatchet
    • One option from each of the following:
      • Bolt pistol or heirloom autopistol
      • Chainsword or power weapon
  • 11 IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operatives selected fromthe following list:
    • NAVIS ARMSMAN
    • NAVIS AXEJACK
    • NAVIS CAT. UNIT
    • NAVIS ENDURANT
    • NAVIS GHEISTSKULL
    • NAVIS GRENADIER
    • NAVIS GUNNER equipped with one of the following options:
      • Meltagun (max one per kill team); gun butt
      • Plasma gun (max one per kill team); gun butt
    • NAVIS HATCHCUTTER
    • NAVIS SURVEYOR
    • NAVIS VOID-JAMMER
Your kill team can only include up to two NAVIS GUNNER operatives. Other than NAVIS ARMSMAN and NAVIS GUNNER operatives, your kill team can only include each operative above once. Your kill team can only include a NAVY GHEISTSKULL operative if it also includes a NAVIS VOID JAMMER operative, and it can only include a NAVIS C.A.T. UNIT operative if it also includes a NAVIS SURVEYOR operative

operatives.description: As disciplined fighters, often with years of experience at the mast, the leaders of Imperial Navy Breacher squads are as skilled in close-quarter fighting as they are in devising battle-winning tactics on the move.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, LEADER, NAVIS, SERGEANT-AT-ARMS

abilities.title: Breach And Clear
abilities.description:
Methodical, professional, and well-drilled, Imperial Navy Breachers work as a unit to breach and clear the corridors and chambers of enemy voidcraft, space hulks, orbital stations, and more.

 Once per Turning Point, when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative is activated, you can use this ability. If you do so:
  • Select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative Visible to and within [SQUARE] of that operative that is eligible to be activated.
  • Until the the Turning Point, those operatives are treated as having a Group Activation characteristic of 2.
  • When the first operative's activation ends, you must select the second operative (even if it is not of the same type) to fulfil the Group Activation requirements.

abilities.title: Command Breach
abilities.description:
At the start of the first Strategy phase, select the Attack Order or Defence Order Strategic Ploy.
Until the end of the battle, while this operative is in the killzone, you can use that Strategic Ploy without spending any Command Points.

abilities.title: Void Armour
abilities.description:
The armour worn by Imperial Navy Armsmen is void-sealed, meaning that they can fight in zero gravity and zero-atmosphere conditions. Being completely encased in protective armour makes the Armsmen much less vulnerable to explosive blasts and flaming torrents.
  • This operative is unaffected by the Splash critical hit rule unless it is the target of the shooting attack.
  • Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, if the ranged weapon has the Blast X or Torrent X special rule, or makes a shooting attack against each operative within range of the specified point (see Detonate), in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your defence dice (or up to two of your defence dice if this operative has the NAVIS GRENADIER keyword).

operatives.description: Well-trained, well-drilled and well-equipped, the Armsmen of Imperial Navy Breacher kill teams are formidable troops in the close confines of ship-to-ship combat. Any foe they cannot blast aside with their powerful shotguns they hack down with vicious blows from their hatchets.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, ARMSMAN

abilities.title: Breach And Clear
abilities.description:
Methodical, professional, and well-drilled, Imperial Navy Breachers work as a unit to breach and clear the corridors and chambers of enemy voidcraft, space hulks, orbital stations, and more.

 Once per Turning Point, when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative is activated, you can use this ability. If you do so:
  • Select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative Visible to and within [SQUARE] of that operative that is eligible to be activated.
  • Until the the Turning Point, those operatives are treated as having a Group Activation characteristic of 2.
  • When the first operative's activation ends, you must select the second operative (even if it is not of the same type) to fulfil the Group Activation requirements.

abilities.title: Void Armour
abilities.description:
The armour worn by Imperial Navy Armsmen is void-sealed, meaning that they can fight in zero gravity and zero-atmosphere conditions. Being completely encased in protective armour makes the Armsmen much less vulnerable to explosive blasts and flaming torrents.
  • This operative is unaffected by the Splash critical hit rule unless it is the target of the shooting attack.
  • Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, if the ranged weapon has the Blast X or Torrent X special rule, or makes a shooting attack against each operative within range of the specified point (see Detonate), in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your defence dice (or up to two of your defence dice if this operative has the NAVIS GRENADIER keyword).

operatives.description: Sometimes, the only solution to a problem toced by Imperial Navy Breachers is a heavy, two-handed axe. The Axejacks who carry these weapons can not only smash through blocked doorways and obstacles, they are also formidable fighters who hack apart any enemy in their way.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, AXEJACK

uniqueactions.title: Wade In
uniqueactions.description:
Perform a free Charge action with this operative.
Then perform a free Fight action with this operative.
If this operative performs both actions, its power weapon gains the Reap 2 critical hit rule for that combat.

abilities.title: Breach And Clear
abilities.description:
Methodical, professional, and well-drilled, Imperial Navy Breachers work as a unit to breach and clear the corridors and chambers of enemy voidcraft, space hulks, orbital stations, and more.

 Once per Turning Point, when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative is activated, you can use this ability. If you do so:
  • Select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative Visible to and within [SQUARE] of that operative that is eligible to be activated.
  • Until the the Turning Point, those operatives are treated as having a Group Activation characteristic of 2.
  • When the first operative's activation ends, you must select the second operative (even if it is not of the same type) to fulfil the Group Activation requirements.

abilities.title: Emboldened
abilities.description:
If this operative performs a Charge action, it is emboldened until the end of the Turning Point.
While this operative is emboldened, each time it would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

abilities.title: Void Armour
abilities.description:
The armour worn by Imperial Navy Armsmen is void-sealed, meaning that they can fight in zero gravity and zero-atmosphere conditions. Being completely encased in protective armour makes the Armsmen much less vulnerable to explosive blasts and flaming torrents.
  • This operative is unaffected by the Splash critical hit rule unless it is the target of the shooting attack.
  • Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, if the ranged weapon has the Blast X or Torrent X special rule, or makes a shooting attack against each operative within range of the specified point (see Detonate), in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your defence dice (or up to two of your defence dice if this operative has the NAVIS GRENADIER keyword).

operatives.description: Cyber-altered Task Units are tracked reconnaissance vehicles that have served the Imperium for millenia. Fitted with pict-recording equipment and frequency scanning augurs, they can be remotely operated to provide vital tactical information for their kill team.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, C.A.T. UNIT

Methodical, professional, and well-drilled, Imperial Navy Breachers work as a unit to breach and clear the corridors and chambers of enemy voidcraft, space hulks, orbital stations, and more.

 Once per Turning Point, when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative is activated, you can use this ability. If you do so:
  • Select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative Visible to and within [SQUARE] of that operative that is eligible to be activated.
  • Until the the Turning Point, those operatives are treated as having a Group Activation characteristic of 2.
  • When the first operative's activation ends, you must select the second operative (even if it is not of the same type) to fulfil the Group Activation requirements.

abilities.title: Machine
abilities.description:
• When drawing a Visibility line from this operative, draw it from any part of the miniature.
  • This operative cannot earn (or lose) experience points and automatically passes Casualty tests.
  • This operative's APL cannot be modified.
  • This operative can perform the Fall Back action for one less Action Point (to a minimum or 1 AP).

abilities.title: Recon
abilities.description: In the scouting step, after resolving your selection, you can perform a free Dash action with this operative if it is wholly within your Drop Zone.

abilities.title: Support Unit
abilities.description:
This operative cannot:
  • Perform any actions other than Dash, Fall Back, Normal Move, or Pass
  • Climb, Jump, or Traverse
  • Make shooting attacks, fight in combat (do not select a weapon or roll any attack dice for it) or provide combat support.
  • Be equipped with equipment or carry anything

operatives.description: Only the biggest Armsmen in a squad become known as Endurants. To them falls the task of carrying an Endurant shield and heavy shotgun while either taking point or guarding the rear of the squad. Their sheer bulk makes them highly intimidating to their enemies.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, ENDURANT

uniqueactions.title: Disengage
uniqueactions.description: Perform a free Fall Back action with this operative.

abilities.title: Breach And Clear
abilities.description:
Methodical, professional, and well-drilled, Imperial Navy Breachers work as a unit to breach and clear the corridors and chambers of enemy voidcraft, space hulks, orbital stations, and more.

 Once per Turning Point, when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative is activated, you can use this ability. If you do so:
  • Select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative Visible to and within [SQUARE] of that operative that is eligible to be activated.
  • Until the the Turning Point, those operatives are treated as having a Group Activation characteristic of 2.
  • When the first operative's activation ends, you must select the second operative (even if it is not of the same type) to fulfil the Group Activation requirements.

abilities.title: Breachwall
abilities.description:
Each time another friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative finishes an action in which it moved and ended that move with its base touching this operative's,
if this operative has an Engage order and is not already shielding a friendly operative,
it can shield that friendly operative until their bases are no longer touching or this operative no longer has an Engage order.
 While a friendly operative is shielded, it is not in an enemy operative's Line of Sight if a Cover line drawn to it crosses this operative's base,
 unless the enemy operative is  at least [CIRCLE] higher than it.

abilities.title: *Shield
abilities.description: Each time this operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, each time it parries, two of your opponent's successful hits are discarded (instead of one).

abilities.title: Void Armour
abilities.description:
The armour worn by Imperial Navy Armsmen is void-sealed, meaning that they can fight in zero gravity and zero-atmosphere conditions. Being completely encased in protective armour makes the Armsmen much less vulnerable to explosive blasts and flaming torrents.
  • This operative is unaffected by the Splash critical hit rule unless it is the target of the shooting attack.
  • Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, if the ranged weapon has the Blast X or Torrent X special rule, or makes a shooting attack against each operative within range of the specified point (see Detonate), in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your defence dice (or up to two of your defence dice if this operative has the NAVIS GRENADIER keyword).

operatives.description: These servo-skulls are often made from the heads of former Imperial Navy Breachers. As a result, they are often named "DeadMan's Revenge" or regarded as the perished soldier's "Last Laugh" for their ability to detonate and kill all around them in a final act of defiance to the enemy.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, FLY, NAVIS, GHEISTSKULL

uniqueactions.title: Boost
uniqueactions.description:
Select a point in the killzone that is Visible to this operative (treat that point as an intended target).
Perform a free Normal Move action with this operative, moving in a single straight line with an unlimited Movement.
It must finish that move with [TRI] of the selected point.
This operative can only perform this action once, and cannot perform it during the first Turning Point.

  • Make shooting attacks, fight in combat (do not select a weapon or roll any attack dice for it) or provide combat support.

operatives.description: It is the life of an Imperial Navy Breacher to become very accustomed to explosions. Even more so for the Grenadiers, These Armsmen carry demolition charges designed to crack through bulkheads and sealed doors enabling their squadmates to keep moving and reach their objectives.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, GRENADIER

abilities.title: Grenadier
abilities.description: This operative is equipped with Frag, Krak, and Stun grenades and they do not cost any equipment points. Those grenades that have the Limited special rule can be selected for this operative's use twice instead of once.

operatives.description: The largest troops in the squad who don't fulfil the role of Endurants carry their squad's heaviest ranged weapons. A las-volley unleashes devastating salvoes, the searing heat of a meltagun shot burns through a reinforced bulkhead, and even heavily-armoured enemies cannot withstand a plasma gun.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, GUNNER

operatives.description: It is vital for the Imperial Navy Breachers to be able to move through enemy ships quickly to reach their objectives. Hatchcutters can not only cut through barricades with their chainfists and plasma torches, they can use the latter to seal shut paths the foe might otherwise use.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, HATCHCUTTER

uniqueactions.title: Breach Point
uniqueactions.description:
Place your Breach Point token so it is within [TRI] of this operative and a terrain feature no more than [TRI] thick.
Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operatives can move throught parts of that terrain feature that are no more than [TRI] thick as if they were not there, so long as they do so within [TRI] of that token.

uniqueactions.title: Weld Shut
uniqueactions.description:
This oeprative can perform this action while within [TRI] of a closed Hatchway.
Until it is opened, that Hatchway is welded shut.
While a Hatchway is welded shut, operatives must subtract 1 additional action point to perform the Operate Hatch action on that Hatchway.
This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

abilities.title: Breach And Clear
abilities.description:

  • When the first operative's activation ends, you must select the second operative (even if it is not of the same type) to fulfil the Group Activation requirements.

abilities.title: Hatchcutter
abilities.description: Each time this operative would perform the Operate Hatch action, no more than one action point needs to be subtracted.

abilities.title: Void Armour
abilities.description:
The armour worn by Imperial Navy Armsmen is void-sealed, meaning that they can fight in zero gravity and zero-atmosphere conditions. Being completely encased in protective armour makes the Armsmen much less vulnerable to explosive blasts and flaming torrents.
  • This operative is unaffected by the Splash critical hit rule unless it is the target of the shooting attack.

operatives.description: Knowing what is around a corner can mean life or detah for Imperial Navy Breachers. By using a C.A.T. unit, which is capable of navigating narrow tunnels and holes, a Surveyor can investigate and prepare their squad for what might be ahead.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, SURVEYOR

uniqueactions.title: Surveillance
uniqueactions.description:
Place your Surveillance token within [PENT] of a friendly NAVIS C.A.T. UNIT operative.
Until the end of the Turning Point, while an enemy operative is Visible To a friendly NAVIS C.A.T. UNIT operative and within [SQUARE] of that token,
that enemy operative is under surveillance.
Each time a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative makes a shooting attack, enemy operatives under surveillance are treated as having an Engage ORder for that shooting attack.
This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative or if a friendly NAVIS C.A.T. UNIT operative is not in the killzone.

uniqueactions.title: Wayfind
uniqueactions.description:
Select one friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operative with [PENT] of either this operative of a friendly NAVIS C.A.T. UNIT operative.
Add 1 to its APL. 
This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

Methodical, professional, and well-drilled, Imperial Navy Breachers work as a unit to breach and clear the corridors and chambers of enemy voidcraft, space hulks, orbital stations, and more.

operatives.description: It falls to the Void-Jammers in an Imperial Navy Breachers kill team to operate Gheistskulls - servo-skulls fitted with an explosive device and an electro-magnetic pulse emitter. These devices can move quickly, fly through the air and navigate terrain far too dense for the Armsmen in order to reach the foe.
operatives.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, VOID-JAMMER

uniqueactions.title: Interference Pulse
uniqueactions.description:
Select one enemy operative Visible To and within [PENT] of a friendly NAVIS GHEISTSKULL operative.
Roll 1D6, adding 1 to the result if that enemy operative is in that friendly NAVIS GHEISTSKULL operative's Line Of Sight.
On a 3+, subtract 1 from that enemy operative's APL.
This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative or if a friendly NAVIS GHEISTSKULL operative is not in the killzone.

abilities.title: Breach And Clear
abilities.description:
Methodical, professional, and well-drilled, Imperial Navy Breachers work as a unit to breach and clear the corridors and chambers of enemy voidcraft, space hulks, orbital stations, and more.
